Plot: Colonel Chabert has been severely wounded in the French-Russian Napoleonic war to the point that the medical examiner has signed his death certificate. When he regains his health and memory...
Title: Colonel Chabert
Writer: Yves Angelo, Jean Cosmos, Véronique Lagrange, Honoré de Balzac (novel)
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Fanny Ardant, Fabrice Luchini, André Dussollier
